name: Pinky Demo - NES Homebrew
description:
A demo of my upcoming NES game. It will be released here on itch later this fall.

Is having an preorder run on my instagram (link in my profile) for a physical cart until 2020-09-04. 

Hope you all like it.

To play you will need an NES-emulator. I suggest "Mesen". But any will do that can handle Mapper30 files.

Cheers // Axbakk Games
